task.title: Creating an Account and Logging In
task.shortdesc: Learn how to create or access your Noter.app account.

taskbody.context: Use the following steps to either create your new Noter.app account or log in to an existing one.

substep.cmd: Complete the registration form with your email and desired password.
Check your email for a verification link and follow instructions.
Enter your registered email address and password in the respective fields.
Check your email for a password reset link and follow the instructions to create a new password.
